## Job.getChildrenValues() method

 getChildrenValues Get this jobs children result values if any.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getChildrenValues<CT = any>(): Promise<{
        [jobKey: string]: CT;
    }>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;{ \[jobKey: string\]: CT; }&gt;

Object mapping children job keys with their values.
